contentItems.text:
Booking Seats on 
SLATE Shuttle Flights

 

XO has partnered with SLATE Aviation to offer by-the-seat shuttle flights for several routes, including between New York and South Florida. The SLATE shuttle schedule is now available through February 2026.  

 

SLATE operates an all-business class service on select premium leisure routes between the Northeast and Florida. Customers will enjoy an exclusive 18-seat cabin, with exceptional comfort and service. 

 

Each SLATE aircraft offers a cabin of up to eighteen captain chairs with Gogo Avance L5 Wi-Fi for high-speed wireless connectivity.

 

Travel from private terminal to private terminal with complimentary access to SLATE lounges in both New York and South Florida for a seamless experience with full ground support. 

 

Learn more.

header.title: Access A Global Fleet
header.subtitle: Request flights on thousands of aircraft.
header.text: The XO global private aviation network offers access to one of the most extensive fleets in the industry — thousands of premium aircraft across all cabin classes.

pageInfo.title: XO Private Jet Fleet | Access Thousands of Aircraft – Light, Midsize & Long-Range Jets
pageInfo.description: Explore the XO private jet fleet with access to more than 2,000 safety-vetted aircraft, including light jets, midsize, super-midsize, and ultra-long-range planes.

fleetExploration.headline: Aircraft Types
fleetExploration.disclaimer: The ranges and/or figures provided for each aircraft class are estimates only. XO makes no representation or warranty with respect to the accuracy of this information or any underlying assumptions and disclaims any obligation to update such estimates.

items.headline: Bombardier Challenger 300
items.bodyCopy: The Challenger 300 has a spacious cabin cross section similar to large, long-range aircraft, offering comfort and efficiency for flights over 5 hours.

items.headline: Bombardier Challenger 350
items.bodyCopy: The ultimate super-midsize business jet, the Challenger 350 has access to more airports than any other contender in its class. Offering a spacious cabin cross section like that of a large, long-range aircraft with a flight time of up to 7 hours.

items.headline: Bombardier Challenger 605
items.bodyCopy: This impressive intercontinental business jet has the widest cabin in its category and offers outstanding performance with the cost efficiency of a smaller jet.

items.headline: Bombardier Global 5000
items.bodyCopy: The Global 5000 is among the most spacious aircraft in its class. Its three-zone cabin space is perfect for conducting business meetings or relaxing. This private jet has a non-stop flight time of up to 11 hours.

items.headline: Bombardier Global 6000
items.bodyCopy: The Global 6000 features a spacious three-zone cabin, including a large galley to support fine dining. It is particularly popular for accessing remote areas of the world.

items.headline: Bombardier Global 7500
items.bodyCopy: The largest and longest-range business jet, the 7500 offers unbeatable global connectivity and can fly up to 17 hours non-stop. Precision-engineered wings provide an exceptionally smooth ride. The large cabin offers four separate living spaces, including a permanent stateroom.

items.headline: Gulfstream GIV-SP
items.bodyCopy: The Gulfstream GIV-SP is an ideal choice for maximum comfort and speed. The expansive cabin in this private jet features a sophisticated interior layout that can accommodate both business and family travel.

links.title: Learn more about the Gulfstream GIV-SP

items.headline: Cessna Citation Ultra
items.bodyCopy: The Citation Ultra is the largest straight-wing aircraft within the Cessna aircraft range. Agility for a stable take-off and landing, coupled with 7 all-leather club seats make this aircraft perfect for comfortably traveling short distances.

links.title: Learn more about the Citation Ultra

items.headline: Cessna Сitation XL/XLS
items.bodyCopy: Citation XL aircraft can fly in and out of smaller airports while offering ample room for up to 7 passengers. This private jet is purpose-built for conducting business on board and includes pull-out executive tables and Wi-Fi.

links.title: Learn more about the Сitation XL/XLS

items.headline: Cessna Citation X
items.bodyCopy: This midsize aircraft combines the stellar runway performance of a light jet with the sought-after comfort of a stand-up cabin, featuring leather club seats, six of which recline.

links.title: Learn more about the Citation X

pageInfo.title: The XO Private Jet Experience: Luxury, Service & Seamless Travel
pageInfo.description: The XO corporate jet experience, where luxurious private jet travel meets convenience. Sign up today to get an instant quote and book your private travel. Fly XO now.

heroText.headline: The XO Private Jet Experience
heroText.subHeadline: XO offers unparalleled support and service — with two ways to fly — providing a premium end‑to‑end travel experience.
heroText.bodyCopy: Our teams are committed to delivering an experience that is all about you.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Booking
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: XO has created a leading digital platform in private aviation. Anyone can use the revolutionary XO mobile app or our website anytime to check guaranteed pricing across a range of aircraft and global routes, with the ability to book flights instantly. Dedicated aviation experts are available day or night to provide trusted guidance on ways to buy and fly.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Pre-flight
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: The XO Client Services team tailors every XO travel experience to meet individual preferences – arranging catering, ground transportation, and concierge services to make every trip seamless and exceptional.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Day of
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: The XO Client Services team also supports your day-of-travel needs – greeting you at the private jet terminal, assisting with boarding, and helping you with anything you may need before takeoff. Flyers must arrive 15 minutes prior to departure for charter flights.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: In-flight
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: Most jets in the Vista Members' fleet and many of the 2,100+ aircraft in the XO alliance fleet include complimentary in-flight WiFi – so you can work efficiently. Additionally, many of the large cabin jets on our most frequented routes include a Cabin Host for improved service.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Arrival
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: The Client Services team can arrange ground transportation that will meet you on the tarmac and bring you to your destination in comfort.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Post-flight
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: Beyond the jet, XO has partnered with some of the world’s finest brands to extend exclusive access to luxury travel and lifestyle benefits and invitation-only events that enrich and broaden the journey. For a full overview of XO’s member benefits & exclusive offers, please discover XO member benefits.

The Easy Way
to Fly Private

Our aviation experts are available 24/7 to help you find the perfect plane for your journey.

header.title: Access A Global Fleet
header.subtitle: Request flights on thousands of aircraft.
header.text: The XO global private aviation network offers access to one of the most extensive fleets in the industry — thousands of premium aircraft across all cabin classes.

pageInfo.title: XO Private Jet Fleet | Access Thousands of Aircraft – Light, Midsize & Long-Range Jets
pageInfo.description: Explore the XO private jet fleet with access to more than 2,000 safety-vetted aircraft, including light jets, midsize, super-midsize, and ultra-long-range planes.

fleetExploration.headline: Aircraft Types
fleetExploration.disclaimer: The ranges and/or figures provided for each aircraft class are estimates only. XO makes no representation or warranty with respect to the accuracy of this information or any underlying assumptions and disclaims any obligation to update such estimates.

items.headline: Bombardier Challenger 300
items.bodyCopy: The Challenger 300 has a spacious cabin cross section similar to large, long-range aircraft, offering comfort and efficiency for flights over 5 hours.

items.headline: Bombardier Challenger 350
items.bodyCopy: The ultimate super-midsize business jet, the Challenger 350 has access to more airports than any other contender in its class. Offering a spacious cabin cross section like that of a large, long-range aircraft with a flight time of up to 7 hours.

items.headline: Bombardier Challenger 605
items.bodyCopy: This impressive intercontinental business jet has the widest cabin in its category and offers outstanding performance with the cost efficiency of a smaller jet.

items.headline: Bombardier Global 5000
items.bodyCopy: The Global 5000 is among the most spacious aircraft in its class. Its three-zone cabin space is perfect for conducting business meetings or relaxing. This private jet has a non-stop flight time of up to 11 hours.

items.headline: Bombardier Global 6000
items.bodyCopy: The Global 6000 features a spacious three-zone cabin, including a large galley to support fine dining. It is particularly popular for accessing remote areas of the world.

items.headline: Bombardier Global 7500
items.bodyCopy: The largest and longest-range business jet, the 7500 offers unbeatable global connectivity and can fly up to 17 hours non-stop. Precision-engineered wings provide an exceptionally smooth ride. The large cabin offers four separate living spaces, including a permanent stateroom.

items.headline: Gulfstream GIV-SP
items.bodyCopy: The Gulfstream GIV-SP is an ideal choice for maximum comfort and speed. The expansive cabin in this private jet features a sophisticated interior layout that can accommodate both business and family travel.

links.title: Learn more about the Gulfstream GIV-SP

items.headline: Cessna Citation Ultra
items.bodyCopy: The Citation Ultra is the largest straight-wing aircraft within the Cessna aircraft range. Agility for a stable take-off and landing, coupled with 7 all-leather club seats make this aircraft perfect for comfortably traveling short distances.

links.title: Learn more about the Citation Ultra

items.headline: Cessna Сitation XL/XLS
items.bodyCopy: Citation XL aircraft can fly in and out of smaller airports while offering ample room for up to 7 passengers. This private jet is purpose-built for conducting business on board and includes pull-out executive tables and Wi-Fi.

links.title: Learn more about the Сitation XL/XLS

items.headline: Cessna Citation X
items.bodyCopy: This midsize aircraft combines the stellar runway performance of a light jet with the sought-after comfort of a stand-up cabin, featuring leather club seats, six of which recline.

links.title: Learn more about the Citation X

pageInfo.title: The XO Private Jet Experience: Luxury, Service & Seamless Travel
pageInfo.description: The XO corporate jet experience, where luxurious private jet travel meets convenience. Sign up today to get an instant quote and book your private travel. Fly XO now.

heroText.headline: The XO Private Jet Experience
heroText.subHeadline: XO offers unparalleled support and service — with two ways to fly — providing a premium end‑to‑end travel experience.
heroText.bodyCopy: Our teams are committed to delivering an experience that is all about you.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Booking
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: XO has created a leading digital platform in private aviation. Anyone can use the revolutionary XO mobile app or our website anytime to check guaranteed pricing across a range of aircraft and global routes, with the ability to book flights instantly. Dedicated aviation experts are available day or night to provide trusted guidance on ways to buy and fly.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Pre-flight
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: The XO Client Services team tailors every XO travel experience to meet individual preferences – arranging catering, ground transportation, and concierge services to make every trip seamless and exceptional.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Day of
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: The XO Client Services team also supports your day-of-travel needs – greeting you at the private jet terminal, assisting with boarding, and helping you with anything you may need before takeoff. Flyers must arrive 15 minutes prior to departure for charter flights.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: In-flight
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: Most jets in the Vista Members' fleet and many of the 2,100+ aircraft in the XO alliance fleet include complimentary in-flight WiFi – so you can work efficiently. Additionally, many of the large cabin jets on our most frequented routes include a Cabin Host for improved service.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Arrival
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: The Client Services team can arrange ground transportation that will meet you on the tarmac and bring you to your destination in comfort.

fiftyFiftyColumnRows.headline: Post-flight
fiftyFiftyColumnRows.bodyCopy: Beyond the jet, XO has partnered with some of the world’s finest brands to extend exclusive access to luxury travel and lifestyle benefits and invitation-only events that enrich and broaden the journey. For a full overview of XO’s member benefits & exclusive offers, please discover XO member benefits.

pageInfo.title: XO: Book Private Jet Charters Instantly | 2,200+ Aircraft Worldwide
pageInfo.description: XO offers instant booking for private jet charters across a global network of 2,000+ jets. Enjoy flexible membership options, and insider access to exclusive events and destinations.
pageInfo.keywords: Private Jet, Book Private Jet, Private Jet Prices

xoMobileApp.headline:
The Easy Way
to Fly Private
xoMobileApp.bodyCopy:
XO is an extensive global private aviation network, providing access to hand–selected aircraft across all cabin classes.  Search and book a private charter in seconds from your mobile device to almost anywhere in the world. Our aviation experts are available 24/7 to help you find the perfect plane for your journey. 

 
Private Flights and Membership: +1 (866) 709-3018
xoMobileApp.bodyCopyMobile:
XO is the global private aviation network, providing access to more than 2,000 hand–selected aircraft across all cabin classes.  Search and book a private charter in seconds from your mobile device on 60,000 routes worldwide. Our aviation experts are available 24/7. 


Private Flights and Membership: +1 (866) 709-3018

homeDiscover.headline: An Unrivaled Global Fleet
homeDiscover.bodyCopy: XO offers access to one of the most extensive fleets in the industry — thousands of premium aircraft across all cabin classes. This also features the unrivaled Vista Members' fleet, including super-midsize to ultra-long-range aircraft and the world-renowned Gulfstream and Global 7500 jets.

HomeBanner2.subtitle: Schedule now available through February 2026.

A global XO Member benefit, XO Firsts offer complimentary invitations and VIP access to high-profile sports and cultural events around the world. Offers have included events in locations from Monaco to Miami, Austin to Monterey and Bahrain to Hong Kong.

Learn more

XO Assets LLC and its sister companies beneficially own or lease the Vista Members' fleet. All services are subject to the terms and conditions available at www.flyxo.com/legal. Fla. Seller of Travel Ref. No. ST42114. All crowdfunded flights are Public Charters organized by XO Global LLC under 14 CFR Part 380. The identity of the properly licensed air carrier performing the crowdfunded flight will be disclosed once the flight is confirmed. Crowdfunded and shared flights are subject to XO's Public Charter Operator Participant Agreement.
